name: Pope Urban III
summary: Urban III, born Uberto Crivelli, was Pope from 1185 to 1187. He had ongoing conflicts with Holy Roman Emperor Frederick I Barbarossa, particularly over the emperor's interference in Italian affairs. He excommunicated the emperor and worked to maintain papal authority. He died while traveling to Venice to mediate a dispute. His pontificate occurred during a period of intense conflict between the papacy and the Holy Roman Empire.
